bi_scope_lookup:
select coalesce(bsla."type",bsl."type") as "type", coalesce(bsla."level",bsl."level") as "level", new_counts, old_counts 
from (select type, level, count(*) as new_counts from bi_scope_lookup group by 1,2) bsl
full outer join (select type, level, count(*) as old_counts from bi_scope_lookup_arc group by 1,2) bsla on bsla."type" = bsl."type" and bsla."level" = bsl."level" 
order by 1,3;

select range_standard_name, array_agg(distinct range_local_name), array_agg(distinct "level")  from bi_scope_lookup
where range_standard_name in (select distinct range_standard_name from bi_scope_lookup where level = 'geo_territory_cluster')
and level not in ('product_cluster','geo_territory_cluster','full_name')
group by range_standard_name
having count(distinct "level")>1;
bi_scope_affiliation:
select coalesce(bsa.scope1_type,bsaa.scope1_type) as scope1_type, coalesce(bsa.scope1_level,bsaa.scope1_level) as scope1_level, coalesce(bsa.scope2_level,bsaa.scope2_level) as scope2_level, new_counts, old_counts 
from (select scope1_type, scope1_level, scope2_level, count(*) as new_counts from bi_scope_affiliation bsa group by 1,2,3) bsa
full outer join (select scope1_type, scope1_level, scope2_level, count(*) as old_counts from bi_scope_affiliation_arc bsaa  group by 1,2,3) bsaa on bsa.scope1_type=bsaa.scope1_type and bsa.scope1_level=bsaa.scope1_level and bsa.scope2_level=bsaa.scope2_level 
order by scope1_type desc, scope1_level;
bi_user_profile:
select coalesce(bup."level",bupa."level") as "level", user_counts_new, user_counts_old 
from (select "level", count(*) as user_counts_new from bi_user_profile group by level) bup
full outer join (select "level", count(*) as user_counts_old from bi_user_profile_arc group by level) bupa on bup."level" = bupa."level" 
order by 1,3;

select products, array_length(products,1) as product_counts, 
markets, array_length(markets,1) as market_counts, 
competitor_cpa, array_length(competitor_cpa,1) as cpa_brand_counts, 
competitor_ims, array_length(competitor_ims,1) as ims_brand_counts, 
array_agg(distinct "level"||': '||array_to_string(territory, ',')) as territories_share_same_permission  
from bi_user_profile group by products, markets, competitor_cpa, competitor_ims order by 2 desc, 4 desc;
